news_insight_text_link.news_insight_description: Monaire, a startup focusing on AI to reduce waste and emissions in small commercial buildings, has secured $3.5 million in seed funding. This investment aims to further develop their AI-enabled HVAC management solutions.

about_short_description.short_description: Monaire is an electronics manufacturing company that offers HVAC and refrigeration management service for small businesses.

product.name: AI-powered HVAC and Refrigeration Management
product.description: An automated service that uses AI to monitor and manage HVAC and refrigeration systems, optimizing performance and reducing costs.

product.name: Cutting-edge Sensors and Controls
product.description: Sensors and controls that convert HVAC and refrigeration systems into smart appliances, capturing signals to identify issues before failure.

product.name: HVAC and Refrigeration Intelligence Platform
product.description: An AI-powered platform that analyzes real-time data from smart systems, raises alerts with accurate error diagnosis, and coordinates repairs.

product.name: Expert Service and Contractor Network
product.description: A network of skilled technicians and contractors who provide repair services, ensuring minimal downtime for customers.

product.name: Automated Maintenance
product.description: A system that provides instant alerts, automated assignment of technicians, and streamlined workflows for HVAC and refrigeration maintenance.

product.name: Preventive Maintenance for Restaurants
product.description: A tailored solution for restaurants that includes preventive maintenance to save on repairs, energy consumption, and food waste.
